<!-- 3. ABOUT ME -->
<!-- A narrative intro is more engaging and easier to read than a YAML block. -->
## ğŸ¯ About Me

<div align="center">
<p>
  I'm a dedicated <strong>Full-Stack Developer</strong> and a Computer Science Engineering student at <strong>SRM University</strong>, currently maintaining an SGPA of <strong>8.54</strong>. Based in India, I am deeply passionate about turning complex problems into elegant, user-centric applications. My core interests lie in <strong>Web Development, Blockchain, and Data Science</strong>, and I am constantly exploring these fields to build innovative tech solutions.
</p>
<p>
  With professional experience as a <strong>Software Developer at VarsityPro</strong> and a <strong>Data Science Intern at Skolor</strong>, I specialize in building robust applications from front to back. My motto is to "Code with purpose, create with passion."
</p>
</div>
